room_title: Escape room "Final Confinement" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
room_description:
You have been given a life sentence at a maximum security prison. You can no longer appeal your case, your fate has been sealed. Your only way out seems to be in a body bag. 

Or, is it? Can you manage to escape before your time is up? You may have escaped from a prison in the past, but at this facility, they planned for repeat offenders.
